name: Blazaar
description:
Blazaar

Blazaar is a parry focused, cooperative bullet hell shoot 'em up that takes place in a now volatile expanse of outer space. A cosmic deity known as Gormand roams across galaxies consuming everything in his path in a quest for power with a hunger insatiable. 

After having their life and home destroyed, Demi, a gaseous star, sets out to fight against all odds in a quest for revenge. Push back against the monsoon of bottom feeding monsters to close the distance and confront Gormand himself.
